"Depart Immediately":
"When matching for a Quest, the Quest will start immediately as soon as you reach the required number of people.

However, if you select \"Depart Immediately\" from the Quest Menu, you can propose starting the quest with just the people who have arrived so far."

"When you select \"Depart Immediately\", the proposal will be put to other players so they can confirm whether they want to start the Quest now or not.

If everyone agrees, the Quest will begin.
â€»Non-answers will be treated as agreement."
